import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills-box', templateUrl: './skills-box.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills-box.component.css'] }) export class SkillsBoxComponent { @Input() skills:string[] = []; @Input() skillsLogos:string[] = []; @Input() logo:string = ""; @Input() boxTitle:string = ""; }
